docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, July 17--Chile has a sixth column as well as a fifth. It is the League of Defence, composed of thousands of youths of all classes and all parties from Socialists to extreme Rightists.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, July 17--Chile has a sixth column as well as a fifth. It is the League of Defence, composed of thousands of youths of all classes and all parties from Socialists to extreme Rightists.

headline.main: CHILE FIGHTS NAZIS WITH SIXTH COLUMN; League of Defense, Youths of All Classes, Keeps on Alert for Subversive Activity AIR LINE PILOTS WATCHED Condor Fliers Have Invaluable Military Data--Big German Colonies Under Scrutiny

byline.original: By RUSSELL B. PORTER Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: American exporters supplying Latin-American nations continue to extend normal credits on most sales there despite the economic setbacks many of the Southern republics have experienced as a result of the European war, the foreign ...

headline.main: LATIN SALES TERMS CONTINUE NORMAL; Only 10% of Exporters Here Tightened Credit Despite Setbacks Due to War ALLIED POSSESSIONS HIT Cash Now Required on Orders From These--Collections Reported Still Poor

docs.snippet: WE all of us have our dreams, and some of them  come true. Two of mine have been: to form an orchestra of highly talented young players that is completely American; and to see all of the Americas united in spirit.
docs.lead_paragraph: WE all of us have our dreams, and some of them come true. Two of mine have been: to form an orchestra of highly talented young players that is completely American; and to see all of the Americas united in spirit.

docs.snippet: WHEN a "lesson in civics" clashes on the air with a prizefight it makes news. That happened the other  night when the scheduled broadcast of the Henry Armstrong-Lew Jenkins battle was routed off WJZ's hookup to make way for the Democratic convention.
docs.lead_paragraph: WHEN a "lesson in civics" clashes on the air with a prizefight it makes news. That happened the other night when the scheduled broadcast of the Henry Armstrong-Lew Jenkins battle was routed off WJZ's hookup to make way for the Democratic convention.

headline.main: NEWS NOTES AND GOSSIP; TELEVISION TO SHUT-DOWN; STATION TO BE REMODELED

docs.snippet: HAVANA, July 20--The PanAmerican Conference of Foreign Ministers, which opens here tomorrow, "will be a new demonstration of the vigor and vitality of the American republics when they work jointly for their common interest," Secretary of State...
docs.lead_paragraph: HAVANA, July 20--The PanAmerican Conference of Foreign Ministers, which opens here tomorrow, "will be a new demonstration of the vigor and vitality of the American republics when they work jointly for their common interest," Secretary of State Cordell Hull declared upon his arrival here this morning.

headline.main: HULL IS ACCLAIMED BY HAVANA THRONG; Secretary Starts Preliminary Talks With Other Delegates on Americas' Problems

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: ATLANTIC CITY, N.J., July 21 --Before a capacity house of 5,000 persons in the ballroom of the Convention Hall, Leopold Stokowski revealed to the public for the first time here tonight the capabilities of his All-American Youth Orchestra.
docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTIC CITY, N.J., July 21 --Before a capacity house of 5,000 persons in the ballroom of the Convention Hall, Leopold Stokowski revealed to the public for the first time here tonight the capabilities of his All-American Youth Orchestra.

headline.main: STOKOWSKI CONDUCTS IN ATLANTIC CITY; All-American Youth Orchestra Heard in First Concert

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
